programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Action. In this stand-alone spin-off, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) is summoned to Japan at the behest of the dying Yashida, head of Japan's largest, most powerful tech giant, who implores Wolverine to protect his granddaughter whom he has chosen to take over the business

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. A young man raised by scientists on Mars returns to Earth to find his father

programme.title: Cold Zone
programme.desc: Action. While vacationing with his family in Alaska, scientist Roger Summers stumbles upon frozen animals in the woods and soon discovers the world may be on the brink of a cataclysmic new ice age

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: Adventure. A group of Yale students studying a medieval site, travel back in time to France circa 1357, amid archaic war, deadly diseases and other unexpected pitfalls, to rescue their professor (Billy Connolly)

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Action. In this stand-alone spin-off, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) is summoned to Japan at the behest of the dying Yashida, head of Japan's largest, most powerful tech giant, who implores Wolverine to protect his granddaughter whom he has chosen to take over the business

programme.title: Beyond The Edge
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Lyubov Aksyonova and Antonio Banderas. Contemporary Moscow. A talented gambler gathers a team of people with supernatural powers to win big at a casino. But they find a much stronger mystical rival

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: Cold war thriller, Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin. A Soviet nuclear missile sub that is being tracked by an American submarine suddenly goes silent and "disappears". When it is determined that the silent Soviet Boomer may be headed for American coastal waters panic ensues

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: Sci-fi action with Bruce Willis. In a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots an FBI agent is forced to venture into the outside world to catch the inventor's killer

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Action comedy. Two Miami cops (Martin Lawrence, Will Smith) watch as $100 million in heroin is stolen from station headquarters, putting them hot on the trail of a French drug lord who leaves a trail of bodies in his wake and only one witness - in need of protection

programme.title: Romeo Is Bleeding
programme.desc: Thriller starring Gary Oldman, Lena Olin and Annabella Sciorra. A corrupt cop who betrays mob witnesses bites off more than he can chew when he attempts to assassinate a beautiful but ruthless Russian-born hit woman

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: A man finds out that he's been poisoned and only has an hour to live. He uses that time to seek revenge and say goodbye to his girlfriend. Action starring Jason Statham and Amy Smart

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Thriller with Armie Hammer. After a failed assassination attempt, a soldier finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical toll of the treacherous conditions

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Sci-Fi with Chris Pine and Zachary Quinto. The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a mysterious new enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A story inspired by "The Canterbury Tales" starring Heath Ledger. When his master dies, a young squire with a gift for jousting hits the road with his two cohorts to prove himself a worthy knight

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic adventure starring Harrison Ford and Anne Heche. A gruff pilot and a New York magazine editor must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Action comedy with Martin Lawrence and Will Smith. Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Miami and come up against a dangerous kingpin whose plans have set off an underground drugs war

programme.title: Ultimate Justice

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Action with J.K. Simmons. In the war-torn Bosnian capital of Sarajevo, US Navy Seal Matt Barnes leads a band of renegades on a covert operation to rescue treasure from the bottom of a lake

programme.title: Vengeance: A Love Story
programme.desc: Action and Thriller starring Nicolas Cage and Anna Hutchison. A Gulf War veteran seeks vengeance against those who assaulted a single mother

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: Drama, Sigourney Weaver, Felicity Jones. A boy attempts to deal with his mother's illness and the bullying of his classmates by escaping to a fantastical world

programme.title: Winter People
programme.desc: Drama. Set in the Appalachians during the Depression, lonely widower Wayland Jackson (Kurt Russell) falls in love with Collie Wright (Kelly McGillis) and becomes involved in a family feud that is sparked by the existence of Collie's illegitimate son

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island. Adventure with Tom Hanks and Paul Sanchez

programme.title: Julie And Julia
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Meryl Streep and Amy Adams. Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book

programme.title: Gung Ho
programme.desc: The workers in an American car plant have to decide between redundancy or being bought out by a Japanese firm that wants to impose some very strange new working practices. Comedy with Michael Keaton and George Wendt

programme.title: True Heart
programme.desc: Two city kids, Sam (Zachery Ty Bryan) and sister Bonnie (Kirsten Dunst), gain a new perspective on life when they're lost in rugged Northwestern Canada and must rely on the help of a native and his bear in this adventure for the family

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animation. Gru (voice of Steve Carell) teams up with his long-lost twin brother, aspiring supervillain Dru (also Carell), to take down his most difficult opponent yet...a former 1980s child star-turned-bad guy named Balthazar Bratt

programme.title: War Horse
programme.desc: WWI drama detailing the remarkable bond between a man named Albert (Jeremy Irvine) and his loyal horse Joey, and the incredible journey Albert takes across Europe when the pair are forcibly separated as the war rages on

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Adventure. This follow-up finds Percy and Annabeth racing out to the Bermuda Triangle in search of the Golden Fleece. In their quest to confront the ultimate evil, Percy and friends battle swarms of mythical creatures with powers far beyond human comprehension

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: Romantic comedy with Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom loves his life, until he realizes he also loves his best friend Hannah. When she gets engaged and asks Tom to be her maid of honor, he attempts to create the perfect wedding...and steal the bride

programme.title: Lost In The Cloud
programme.desc: Comedy. A couple (Cameron Diaz, Jason Segel) put some spice back into their marriage by recording a lovemaking session for posterity. Unfortunately it goes viral, sending the couple are on a madcap mission to save their reputations and avoid some serious embarrassment

programme.title: Lost In The Cloud
programme.desc: Comedy. A couple (Cameron Diaz, Jason Segel) put some spice back into their marriage by recording a lovemaking session for posterity. Unfortunately it goes viral, sending the couple are on a madcap mission to save their reputations and avoid some serious embarrassment

programme.title: All Eyez On Me
programme.desc: Drama. The true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur (Demetrius Shipp Jr.), from his early days in New York to his status as one of the world's most recognised and influential voices

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Adventure. Fifteen-year-old Brandon longs for a pair of the freshest Air Jordans, assuming that wearing them will help him escape his reality. Working hard to get them, they are promptly snatched. Brandon goes on a dangerous mission to retrieve his stolen sneakers

programme.title: Despicable Me 3

programme.title: Beautiful Beast
programme.desc: Romance. A twist on the classic Beauty and the Beast tale. When Isabelle, a beauty only on the outside, becomes lost in the wilderness, she stumbles upon Jeremy, a man hiding from his past. Will Isabelle revert to the beast and give up her chance at real love?

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: Akeelah And The Bee
programme.desc: A young girl has a talent for spelling, which leads her all the way to the National Spelling Bee, despite objections from her mother. Drama starring Laurence Fishburne and Angela Bassett

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Hip romantic drama starring Kate Bosworth and Michelle Rodriguez. A surf chick's preparations for a big competition are disrupted by love when she falls for a football player (Matthew Davis)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Jason Statham, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta. Mercenary Frank Martin, who specialises in moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami where he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful U.S. politician

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: The haunting story of three people whose lives are irrevocably changed by a tragic accident. Benicio Del Toro, Naomi Watts and Sean Penn star

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: The haunting story of three people whose lives are irrevocably changed by a tragic accident. Benicio Del Toro, Naomi Watts and Sean Penn star

programme.title: The Wolfman
programme.desc: Horror, with Benicio del Toro and Anthony Hopkins. A man experiences an unsettling transformation when he returns to his ancestral home in Victorian-era Great Britain and gets attacked by a rampaging werewolf

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Nicole Kidman and Jason Bateman. A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: Beautiful Beast
programme.desc: Romance. A twist on the classic Beauty and the Beast tale. When Isabelle, a beauty only on the outside, becomes lost in the wilderness, she stumbles upon Jeremy, a man hiding from his past. Will Isabelle revert to the beast and give up her chance at real love?

programme.title: Akeelah And The Bee
programme.desc: A young girl has a talent for spelling, which leads her all the way to the National Spelling Bee, despite objections from her mother. Drama starring Laurence Fishburne and Angela Bassett

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Dean
programme.desc: A comedy about loss, grief and the redemptive power of love. A freelance illustrator in New York suffers a quarter-life crisis and leaves his home for the west coast

programme.title: A Midsummer's Hawaiian Dream
programme.desc: This romantic comedy follows two married anthropology professors and two of their students on a trip to Hawaii, as they attempt to recover an ancient relic from a doomed jungle. Unfortunately, their plans are sent awry when a shaman casts a love spell on them

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Comedy. Big, brawny cop John Kimble (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's school, Kimble must go undercover, as a kindergarten teacher

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: Action with Lucas Till and Jane Levy. Tripp builds a Monster Truck from scrapped cars. After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange a subterranean creature, he may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Action sci-fi. Several months after the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, while fighting a new threat, the Vulture

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: An M. Night Shyamalan thriller. Three friends kidnapped by a ruthless stranger (James McAvoy) soon learn their captor has multiple-personality disorder, forcing them to plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas they will confront on their way out

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: An M. Night Shyamalan thriller. Three friends kidnapped by a ruthless stranger (James McAvoy) soon learn their captor has multiple-personality disorder, forcing them to plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas they will confront on their way out

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: A rape victim, enraged at the light sentence her attackers received goads a female prosecutor to charge the men who literally cheered the attack on. Drama with Kelly McGillis

programme.title: The Masked Saint
programme.desc: Action starring Brett Granstaff and Lara Jean. A pastor and professional wrestler accepts a position at a struggling church where he helps the community both in his official capacity and as his alter ego The Saint

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Action sci-fi. Several months after the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, while fighting a new threat, the Vulture

programme.title: Of Mind And Music
programme.desc: In this documentary companion to Charlie's Country, Australian actor David Gulpilil tells the story of when his people's way of life was derailed by ours

programme.title: Paterson
programme.desc: Drama. A week in the life of Paterson (Adam Driver), a city bus driver in Paterson, NJ, as he balances the demands of his working-class job with his passion for poetry and the creative yearnings of his stay-at-home wife Laura

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A male scientist must become pregnant in order to test a new fertility drug. Comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito

programme.title: Angus Thongs And Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: Comedy starring Eleanor Tomlinson and Georgia Groome. The story centres on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager including the things she learns about kissing

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Comedy starring Salma Hayek and Rob Lowe. An aging Latin lover gets dumped by his sugar mama and must fend for himself in a harsh world

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Horror and Thriller. Two sisters on Mexican vacation are trapped in a shark observation cage at the bottom of the ocean, with oxygen running low and great whites circling nearby, they have less than an hour of air left to figure out how to get to the surface

programme.title: The Rezort
programme.desc: Horror. After a zombie outbreak, adventure seekers are invited to a luxury island resort where they can hunt the mindless undead on safari

programme.title: Somnus
programme.desc: Adventure. A crew working the Earth-Mars route has to change course after a ship malfunction. When the ship is forced to land on Somnus, a remote asteroid colony, they discover the colony is populated by a mysterious and sinister cult, hell-bent on dark plans for Earth

programme.title: The Birds

programme.title: A Deadly View
programme.desc: Thriller. Restricted to bed rest for the remainder of her pregnancy, Rachel sees things in a different light with her neighbor Sandy. Is Rachel going stir crazy with increasing paranoia or is her unborn child what Sandy truly desires?

programme.title: Chronology
programme.desc: Sci-Fi starring William Baldwin and Laura James. After witnessing a horrific sight, two men inexplicably claim to be one another at New Year's Eve parties...only the parties are six years apart

programme.title: Priceless
programme.desc: In this thrilling drama, a man desperate for work agrees to drive a box truck across the country, before realising he has been roped into a human trafficking scandal. Will he risk everything by trying to save the lives of the women he's meant to deliver?

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters attempt to expand their seance scam business by adding a new paranormal stunt to their act. However, it backfires when they accidentally invite genuine evil into their home

programme.title: Sleeping With The Enemy
programme.desc: She is a stranger in a small town. She changed her name. Her looks. Her life. All to escape the most dangerous man she's ever met. Her husband. Thriller with Julia Roberts and Patrick Bergin

programme.desc: Drama with Nicolas Cage and Patricia Arquette. A Manhattan ambulance paramedic, overworked and haunted by visions of his failures, fights hard to maintain his increasingly tenuous grip on reality

programme.desc: Horror. Three American backpackers are introduced to the local legend of Lemon Tree Passage, where a ghost-motorcyclist warns drivers to slow down. After witnessing the ghost firsthand, they uncover a malevolent force that threatens the final days of their vacation

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: Drama starring Blake Lively and Jason Clarke. A blind woman's relationship with her husband changes when she regains her sight and discovers disturbing details about themselves

programme.desc: Thriller starring Mark Lewis and Michael Jibson. Based on real events which saw two lighthouse keepers stranded for months at sea in a freak storm, the film tells a tale of death, madness and isolation; a desolate trip into the heart of human darkness

programme.title: Avengers Grimm
programme.desc: Fantasy action. When Rumpelstiltskin (Casper Van Dien) destroys the Magic Mirror and is catapulted to the modern world, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White and Rapunzel follow to fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army of thralls before he enslaves everyone on Earth

programme.title: Fishing Without Nets
programme.desc: Drama. A desperate Somali father becomes a pirate in order to feed his family, but experiences an intense crisis of conscience and so tries to extricate himself from the events

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: Thriller starring Bill Paxton and Sophie Nélisse. Follows Casey and Jonas, two teenagers desperate to escape their broken and abusive homes and examines the desperation of life on the run and the beauty of first love

programme.title: Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Horror and thriller starring Doug Jones and Douglas Smith. Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts

programme.title: Boys In The Trees
programme.desc: Fantasy drama. Alienated teens Corey and Jonah begrudgingly find themselves together on Halloween 1997, their last night of high school. They embark on a journey through their visceral memories, dreams and fears as they lay the ghosts of their past to rest

programme.desc: Sci-fi action. Timur, a policeman whose career is on the rise, is forced to break the law in order to save his fiancee, Keira. During his illegal activities he discovers that a global corporation is trying to overtake people's minds to control the future

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Thriller starring Mark Lewis and Michael Jibson. Based on real events which saw two lighthouse keepers stranded for months at sea in a freak storm, the film tells a tale of death, madness and isolation; a desolate trip into the heart of human darkness

programme.title: Avengers Grimm
programme.desc: Fantasy action. When Rumpelstiltskin (Casper Van Dien) destroys the Magic Mirror and is catapulted to the modern world, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White and Rapunzel follow to fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army of thralls before he enslaves everyone on Earth

programme.title: Fishing Without Nets
programme.desc: Drama. A desperate Somali father becomes a pirate in order to feed his family, but experiences an intense crisis of conscience and so tries to extricate himself from the events

programme.title: Mean Dreams
programme.desc: Thriller starring Bill Paxton and Sophie Nélisse. Follows Casey and Jonas, two teenagers desperate to escape their broken and abusive homes and examines the desperation of life on the run and the beauty of first love

programme.title: Victor And The Secret Of Crocodile Mansion
programme.desc: Adventure. Among African masks and stuffed crocodiles, Victor finds a diary in his great-uncle's mansion. The book and its drawings reveal a long-hidden secret about a young woman who died in the house many years earlier

programme.title: Emilie Jolie
programme.desc: This animated musical tells the tale of a little girl in the wonderful world of her book who must overcome her fears to save the baby blue rabbit kidnapped by an evil witch, and save her book from destruction

programme.title: The Wheelers
programme.desc: Animation. A small group of friends calling themselves "The Wheelers" patrol the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighbourhood from vandals and crime. One day they meet BUFO a friendly alien on the run from the sinister Air Defence Bureau

programme.title: The Fairy Tales Tree
programme.desc: Animation. Featuring characters from famous fairytales, such as Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood and Three Little Pigs, the well-known inhabitants of the Fairytale Forest experience some fun and exciting adventures together

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Animation. Fenn the Troll (Ja Rule) hates the Troll pastime of pranking and is teased for it that he runs away. When a park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his friends without pulling any pranks. Dick Van Dyke lends his voice

programme.title: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course
programme.desc: Steve Irwin parlays his success as a confronter of all things scaly & rescues an endangered crocodile, not realising the critter has swallowed a top-secret satellite beacon that's the subject of an intense CIA search

programme.title: The Bounce Back
programme.desc: Comedy starring Nadine Velazquez Shemar Moore. A relationship guru and best-selling author finds himself falling for the licensed therapist who questions his methods

programme.title: Father Of The Bride Part II
programme.desc: Comedy with Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, Martin Short. A worrisome family patriarch is driven to distraction by the simultaneous pregnancies of his wife and daughter, and the return of the oddly accented wedding designer who has moved into baby showers and home decor

programme.desc: Comedy starring Tyler Perry and Cassi Davis. Madea and the gang encounter monsters, goblins and boogeymen at a haunted campground

programme.title: Crash Pad
programme.desc: Drama with Christina Applegate. A hopeless romantic, who thinks he's found true love with an older woman, learns that she's married and that the fling is merely an instrument of revenge against her neglectful husband

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Comedy. Sonny (Adam Sandler) has spent his whole life avoiding responsibility but when his girlfriend dumps him for an older man, he's got to find a way to prove he's ready to grow up. In a desperate last-ditch effort, Sonny adopts a 5-year-old kid to impress her

programme.title: Confessions Of A Shopaholic
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Isla Fisher. A college graduate lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City where she nurtures her addiction to shopping and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur

programme.desc: Drama. The Raymans are a wealthy Jewish family that's falling apart. The son, Clark, is a bright and curious high schooler with a talent for manipulation. As his mother checks into rehab and he fights with his father, Clark thinks about running away from home

programme.desc: A clairvoyant woman (Demi Moore) is able to help folk in her neighbourhood but fails to predict that her butcher husband will fall in love with another woman. This comic fantasy charts the various romantic detours and conflicts that result from her paranormal meddling

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Matt Dillion, Annabella Sciorra, Mary-Louise Parker. Too strapped to go in on a bowling-alley investment with friends, electrician Gus tries to end the alimony payments which keep him in debt by arranging a marriage for his ex-wife

programme.desc: Adventure drama starring Sally Hawkins and Michael Shannon. At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity

programme.title: All Saints

programme.title: Columbus
programme.desc: A Korean-born man finds himself stuck in Columbus, Indiana, where his architect father is in a coma. The man meets a young woman who wants to stay in Columbus with her mother, a recovering addict, instead of pursuing her own dreams

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: Drama. Skyler, an aspiring street dancer competes for a university scholarship, but is discouraged by her family. Determined to prove them all wrong, she practices in Atlanta's underground dance studio to take her skills to the next level

programme.desc: Drama. After being gone for a decade, Liam Page (Alex Roe), a world-famous recording artist, reunites with his first love, Josie Preston (Jessica Rothe) and realises the steep price he has paid for his success

programme.title: The Meanest Man In Texas
programme.desc: A biographical drama set in 1928, Texas, a young Clyde Thompson finds himself in the wrong place, at the wrong time, in the wrong company. A fight breaks out, and after shooting two men in self-defense, Clyde is convicted of murder, and sentenced to death

programme.title: After The Reality
programme.desc: Drama and comedy starring Matthew Morrison and Sarah Chalke. The life of a contestant on a 'Bachelorette' style reality show is thrown into turmoil when the sudden death of his father forces him to quit the series prematurely and reconnect with his estranged sister

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: Adventure and comedy. A group of kids, a Shih tzu dog, a wood, a vet, a police officer with his team and the typical gang of bad guys will be the main characters of a funny action movie. ...Without forgetting that there will be almost 30 Shih tzu dogs!!

programme.desc: Drama. Skyler, an aspiring street dancer competes for a university scholarship, but is discouraged by her family. Determined to prove them all wrong, she practices in Atlanta's underground dance studio to take her skills to the next level

programme.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Frances Mcdormand and Woody Harrelson. A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit

programme.desc: Drama. After being gone for a decade, Liam Page (Alex Roe), a world-famous recording artist, reunites with his first love, Josie Preston (Jessica Rothe) and realises the steep price he has paid for his success

programme.title: The Meanest Man In Texas
programme.desc: A biographical drama set in 1928, Texas, a young Clyde Thompson finds himself in the wrong place, at the wrong time, in the wrong company. A fight breaks out, and after shooting two men in self-defense, Clyde is convicted of murder, and sentenced to death

programme.title: After The Reality
programme.desc: Drama and comedy starring Matthew Morrison and Sarah Chalke. The life of a contestant on a 'Bachelorette' style reality show is thrown into turmoil when the sudden death of his father forces him to quit the series prematurely and reconnect with his estranged sister

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: Adventure and comedy. A group of kids, a Shih tzu dog, a wood, a vet, a police officer with his team and the typical gang of bad guys will be the main characters of a funny action movie. ...Without forgetting that there will be almost 30 Shih tzu dogs!!

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: Drama. Skyler, an aspiring street dancer competes for a university scholarship, but is discouraged by her family. Determined to prove them all wrong, she practices in Atlanta's underground dance studio to take her skills to the next level

programme.title: Golden Exits
programme.desc: Drama starring Emily Browning, Mary-Louise Parker and Jason Schwartzman. An intersectional narrative set in Brooklyn, N.Y., of a young foreign girl who upsets the precarious balance that holds two families together

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Comedy. Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when their intrusive fathers arrive to turn the holiday upside down. Mel Gibson, John Lithgow also star

programme.title: Music Of The Heart
programme.desc: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids

programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: Thriller. Deep into a solo voyage, a man (Robert Redford) wakes to find his yacht taking on water after colliding with a shipping container. With the sun unrelenting, sharks circling & supplies dwindling, the sailor soon finds himself staring his mortality in the face

programme.title: O (Othello)
programme.desc: Drama. An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in an upper class prep school, & centered around basketball player Odin

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about John du Pont, the schizophrenic millionaire who shot & killed his friend and Olympic gold-medal wrestler Dave Schultz before locking himself in his mansion for two days as police negotiated his surrender. Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo star

programme.title: Amelie

programme.title: Man Of The House

programme.title: Loosies
programme.desc: Romantic drama. A onetime lover (Jaimie Alexander) confronts a pickpocket and tells him that she is pregnant with his child

programme.title: Welcome To The Jungle
programme.desc: Adventure comedy. When a wilderness seminar goes horribly wrong, and the unhinged ex-marine teambuilding coach (Jean-Claude Van Damme) gets mauled by a tiger, Chris (Adam Brody) and his co-workers find themselves stranded on a tropical island with no rescue in sight

programme.title: Fort Bliss
programme.desc: Drama, Michelle Monaghan, Ron Livingston, Manolo Cardona. A decorated U.S. Army medic discovers her relationship with her young son may be damaged beyond repair upon returning from a long tour of duty in Afghanistan and attempting to resume duties as a single mother

programme.desc: When the military facility goes on high alert, Chris manages to escape, but he's not the only one who gets out

programme.title: Suits
programme.desc: Harvey laces up for a rematch against an old foe. Louis struggles to hold the reins of the firm

programme.desc: As a barroom fight sends Dr. Shaun Murphy to seek treatment at St. Bonaventure's, Dr. Alex Park and Dr. Audrey Lim disagree over an elderly woman's post-operative symptoms. Meanwhile, Dr. Neil Melendez and Dr. Lim make their romance public

programme.title: New Amsterdam
programme.desc: When a history-making blizzard hits New York, Max and his staff must work together to keep their patients safe with little resources, even if it means taking to the streets of the city and braving the storm

programme.title: This Is Us
programme.desc: Tensions run high as the Pearsons await news about Kate's pregnancy

programme.title: The Sinner
programme.desc: Ambrose returns to Mosswood to confront Vera about the commune's work

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: Delving deeper into the hidden meanings and concealed secrets of Bombyx Mori, Strike and Robin scour all corners of London's literary world to unmask the killer

programme.title: Animals.
programme.desc: Three years after the green bomb wiped out humans in New York, rats Phil and Mike traverse the city following a wild, drunken night, searching for a missing car and encountering multiple species and terrors along the way

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: Kim tries to turn the tables on a young mugger, but instead ends up forcing Louie into the role of night watchman

programme.title: Something The Lord Made
programme.desc: Biopic bringing to life the story of two medical pioneers (Alan Rickman, Mos Def). While they work side by side, they do not walk the same paths in society, and one develops deep resentment that he's been given little credit for his contribution to a medical innovation

programme.title: On Freddie Roach
programme.desc: Series chronicling the daily activities of celebrated boxing trainer & International Hall of Fame inductee Freddie Roach as he works with elite fighters at his Wild Card Boxing Club, Hollywood, CA, all while fighting an ailment very likely linked to his own boxing past

programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. In a dystopian future where books are banned and ordered to be burned, a so-called fireman (Michael B. Jordan) goes about his work without questioning motives. All this changes when he meets a young girl who makes him challenge his actions and convictions

programme.title: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Albert Finney, Vanessa Redgrave and Jim Broadbent, based on Winston Churchill's memoirs about his life leading up to World War II

programme.title: Six By Sondheim
programme.desc: Documentary. An intimate look at the life and art of legendary composer-lyricist Stephen Sondheim, the man who has redefined musical theatre over the course of a six-decade career through such ground-breaking works as "Sweeney Todd" and "Sunday in the Park with George"

programme.title: Paycheck To Paycheck: The Life & Times Of Katrina
programme.desc: Documentary. The story of a year in the life of one mother whose daily struggles illuminate the challenges faced by more than 42 million American women, constantly getting knocked back by a system that almost seems designed to see her fail

programme.title: Buena Vista Social Club: Adios
programme.desc: Documentary. Twenty years after their first session, members of the Cuban-music supergroup the Buena Vista Social Club discuss how their breakout success altered their lives

programme.title: It Will Be Chaos
programme.desc: An epic, yet intimate portrait of lives in transit and the human consequences of the refugee crisis spanning the Mediterranean, focusing on two unforgettable refugee stories of human strength and resilience in search of a better and safer future

programme.title: I Am Bolt
programme.desc: Documentary on the career and legacy of hugely charismatic and globally adored Jamaican runner Usain Bolt – officially the fastest man alive

programme.title: Blitzed: Nazis On Drugs
programme.desc: The Nazis proclaimed to be warriors against moral degeneracy and yet the Third Reich was permeated with drugs, also crucial to troops' resilience. While drugs cannot on their own explain the events or outcome of WWII, this film shows they change our understanding of it

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: The US has thrived on its vibrant and free press since the Founding Fathers first put the concept into law in the Bill of Rights. Now Foreign policy is tweeted from the White House and "fake news" has entered the zeitgeist. What's next for media and the free press?

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: Once seen as a model of democracy, Turkey may be slipping toward autocracy. Critics charge that President Recip Tayyip Erdogan used a failed coup d'etat in 2016 as a means of consolidating power. Great Decisions examines the relationship with this key U.S. ally

programme.title: Americans In Bed
programme.desc: Documentary. In a country with the third-highest rate of divorce in the world, what makes or breaks a relationship in the USA today? From the privacy of their own bedrooms, ten couples offer frank, funny and often surprising insights into love, sex and marriage

programme.title: Americans In Bed
programme.desc: Documentary. In a country with the third-highest rate of divorce in the world, what makes or breaks a relationship in the USA today? From the privacy of their own bedrooms, ten couples offer frank, funny and often surprising insights into love, sex and marriage

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The acclaimed series returns for a sixth season, providing the Emmy-winning comedian/actor/writer John Oliver a unique platform to offer up his deeply funny and profoundly necessary perspective on any number of social, political or existential issues

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A prominent family meets their new neighbours in the only Departure-free town in America - Jarden, Texas, renamed "Miracle" after it was discovered no one departed - and experience a mysterious event that will forever change their lives

programme.title: Tell Me You Love Me
programme.desc: May gets devastating news, but decides not to cancel her therapy sessions. Jamie and Hugo reconnect, for better or for worse. Palek's blunt revelation at May's office shocks Carolyn. Having faced the crossroads and challenges, Dave and Katie finally make a breakthrough

programme.title: Lewis Black: Red, White & Screwed
programme.desc: Black stars in an all-new hour of comedy and commentary taped live in Washington, D.C. As one of America's most irreverent and political humourists, he has performed his hyperactive comedy routines throughout Europe and the U.S

programme.title: Ambushed
programme.desc: Action thriller, Courtney B. Vance, Jeremy Lelliott. A cop and his partner look into the suspicious death of a Ku Klux Klan leader. The dead man's son was the only witness. When his partner is also killed, fearing unjust retribution the cop and the Klansman's son flee

programme.title: Barbarians At The Gate
programme.desc: Comedy drama recounting the true-life story of a corporate takeover in the greed-driven 1980s. When Ross Johnson (James Garner), CEO of R.J. R. Nabisco decides to buy out the Nabisco shareholders and take over his company, no one is prepared for what hits the fan

programme.title: Nightingale
programme.desc: Drama. A brutal deed has just taken place. A man (David Oyelowo) undone by mental illness addresses the followers of his video log about his obsession with an old buddy. He speaks of the good times and of love, but the layers of self-deception and posturing are myriad

programme.title: Blitzed: Nazis On Drugs
programme.desc: The Nazis proclaimed to be warriors against moral degeneracy and yet the Third Reich was permeated with drugs, also crucial to troops' resilience. While drugs cannot on their own explain the events or outcome of WWII, this film shows they change our understanding of it

programme.title: Taking Chance
programme.desc: Docudrama inspired by the true story of a US Marine (Kevin Bacon) who offered to escort the remains of a 19-year-old soldier killed in Iraq to his hometown in Wyoming, making it his personal mission to ensure his fallen brother is laid to rest with the proper respect

programme.title: Into The Storm
programme.desc: Drama. Churchill (Brendan Gleeson) rises to the call and becomes a national hero, disregarding the effects his actions have on both his political career and his marriage to Clemmie (Janet McTeer) in a single-minded effort to defeat one of history's greatest tyrants

programme.title: Superheroes
programme.desc: A look inside the zany world of Real Life Superheroes: men and women who have superhero alter-egos. This documentary delves into what inspires them to patrol city streets with the goal of deterring violent crime and, if necessary, taking the law into their own hands

programme.title: Spielberg
programme.desc: Through exclusive interviews with actors, family, and the filmmaker himself, this unprecedented documentary pulls back the curtain on the remarkable career of Steven Spielberg

programme.title: An Inconvenient Sequel: Truth To Power
programme.desc: This sequel to the Oscar-winning documentary, An Inconvenient Truth (2006) follows former Vice President Al Gore, in moments both funny and poignant, as he travels the world to combat climate change, also detailing his efforts at the UN's 2015 Climate Change Conference

programme.title: White Light/Black Rain
programme.desc: Through the powerful recollections of the survivors of the atomic bombs that levelled Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945, this documentary presents a deeply moving look at the painful legacy of the first - and hopefully last - uses of thermonuclear weapons in war

programme.title: The Boy Inside: Trapped By The Tourettes
programme.desc: A documentary which follows an extraordinary year in the life of a teenager with one of the worst cases of Tourettes in America. Zack Lamb's twitches and the strange sounds he makes are uncontrollable – and they are getting worse

programme.title: Future Human AI
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has the potential to change our lives in numerous, unimaginable ways. This enlightening series explores ground-breaking developments and seeks to answer questions about the kind of existence A.I. might be forging for us and future generations

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: The global power balance is rapidly evolving, leaving the U.S. at a turning point with respect to its level of engagement and the role of its military. How does the military function in today's international order and what role should diplomacy play in defence strategy?

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: For decades, the U.S. has been a leader in promoting global health, but foreign assistance has fallen out of favour in some circles in Washington, arguing the U.S. should help America first. Is the golden age of global health coming to an end, or just getting started?

programme.title: The Traffickers
programme.desc: Nelufar Hedayat investigates the fake pharmaceutical industry. It's so profitable criminal gangs are ditching cocaine and heroin for counterfeit medicine. Nelufar follows the fake pharma trail across West Africa to the source of the drugs in China

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: In South Sudan, thousands have been killed, abducted or displaced by Joseph Kony's Lord's Resistance Army. French photojournalist Veronique de Viguerie travels with the Arrow Boys, an unpaid militia of farmers who took up arms to protect their families from the LRA

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: The new Garvey clan gets a fresh start in the safety of Miracle. Nora makes an impulsive choice, while Kevin gets entangled in the Murphy family's problems

programme.title: Bernard And Doris
programme.desc: Biographical drama exploring the relationship shared between tobacco heiress Doris Duke (Susan Sarandon) and her butler Bernard Lafferty (Ralph Fiennes) who, after just 6 years service, was posthumously awarded complete control of his former boss' multi-million fortune

programme.title: The Comrades Of Summer
programme.desc: Comedy, Joe Mantegna, Natalya Negoda, Michael Lerner. To teach a team of Russian wannabe baseball players the finer points of the all-American game is no easy task, but for a grudgingly resentful, recently fired baseball manager from the States, the task is formidable

programme.title: Mrs. Harris
programme.desc: Drama starring Annette Bening, Ben Kingsley and Cloris Leachman, based on the sensational 1980s media event when famed cardiologist Herman Tarnower met a particularly brutal end at the hands of his jilted lover, Jean Harris

programme.title: Taking Chance
programme.desc: Docudrama inspired by the true story of a US Marine (Kevin Bacon) who offered to escort the remains of a 19-year-old soldier killed in Iraq to his hometown in Wyoming, making it his personal mission to ensure his fallen brother is laid to rest with the proper respect

programme.title: Hostile Waters
programme.desc: Thriller starring Rutger Hauer, Martin Sheen, and Max von Sydow. 1986, an American submarine collides into a Soviet sub of the coast of Bermuda and an ensuing standoff occurs that could lead to total annihilation

programme.title: Starter For 10
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring James McAvoy, Alice Eve, Rebecca Hall. A working-class English boy who has been fortunate enough to be accepted into a posh private university struggles to realise his lifelong dream while simultaneously winning the heart of the girl he loves

programme.title: Empire Falls: Part I
programme.desc: Two-part miniseries with an all-star cast telling the humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants whose lives are deeply rooted in, and influenced by, the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past

programme.title: Empire Falls: Part II
programme.desc: Two-part miniseries with an all-star cast telling the humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants whose lives are deeply rooted in, and influenced by, the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past

programme.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
programme.desc: Fast, funny and farcical, this sci-fi comedy follows three social misfits - two geeks and a cynic - as they attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum in the middle of a British pub. Chris O'Dowd, Dean Lennox Kelly, Marc Wootton and Anna Faris star

programme.title: Confirmation
programme.desc: Drama, Kerry Washington, Wendell Pierce, Jeffrey Wright. The confirmation hearings for Judge Clarence Thomas become a media spectacle when his former collegue Anita Hill accuses the Supreme Court Justice nominee of sexual harassment

programme.title: From The Earth To The Moon
programme.desc: A documentary film crew follows the final preparations for the first manned Apollo launch. Now behind schedule due to the Apollo 1 fire, astronauts and launch pad personnel bet their lives - and America's space future - on its success

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: Kim's plans for a July 4th bash are dashed when Louie uses her shopping money to make a dumb impulse purchase

programme.title: Animals.
programme.desc: Struggling to adapt in a post-owner world, dog Phil fights to maintain his independence and his long-time addiction to human dependency

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: In an effort to fix his public image, Logan agrees to a family therapy session at Connor's ranch, intending it to double as a publicity stunt. Shiv considers putting herself in a precarious situation when Nate pushes her to join the team of a presidential candidate

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Kevin returns to Maine and Olive is able to convince him to stay over and attend Christopher's wedding-rehearsal dinner. Olive clashes with the bride's mother and scares the flower girl at the ceremony

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, Mildred opens her new restaurant and reconnects with Monty, whose lethargy tests the bonds between Mildred and Veda

programme.desc: Biopic. When Orson Welles (Liev Schreiber) announced that he intended to make the film Citizen Kane based on the life of tyrannical multi-millionaire publisher William Randolph Hearst (James Cromwell), what he didn't count on was the power of Hearst to stop production

programme.title: On Freddie Roach

programme.desc: Based on actual events that occurred during the 1994 uprising in Rwanda, this drama tells the tale of two brothers whose differing loyalties found them on opposing sides of the conflict, and whose lives would never be the same following this tragic turn of events

programme.desc: Follow the magical adventures of genie twin sisters Shimmer and Shine and their human best friend Leah, who, when needing help with various dilemmas, is granted three wishes after summoning the genies with a rub of her oil lamp pendant necklace

programme.title: Wallykazam!
programme.desc: Wallykazam! is about the adventures of Wally Trollman and his pet dragon, Norville. Wally has a magic stick that makes words come to life; each story has a new set of magic words, and Wally uses these words to playfully transform the world around him

programme.title: Zack & Quack
programme.desc: Zack and Quack live inside the most amazing pop-up book ever. It's a place where pulling tabs, flaps and levers makes awesome and unexpected things happen. Exciting new worlds and fantastic voyages literally unfold before our eyes!

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Best friends and cadets-in-training Swift, Penny, Rod, and Brody congregate at Top Wing Academy, where they learn what it takes to gain their wings and become rescue birds on Big Swirl Island

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze, the world's most amazing monster truck, and his driver and best friend, 8-year-old AJ, live in Axle City with their monster truck buddies. Whenever there's trouble, he's the truck everyone turns to for help because he can do things no other truck can!

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets - along with best bud Ruby - invents his way out of every jam by repurposing parts and objects into the wildest, coolest most awesome contraptions ever!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A team of pups led by the energetic Ryder are always at the ready when it comes to helping out around the bustling town of Adventure Bay. They have all the tools, gadgets and gumption they need to help out their community

programme.title: Dora The Explorer
programme.desc: This play-along, animated adventure series stars Dora, our seven-year-old heroine who asks preschoolers for their help on her adventures. Along the way, they'll meet friends, overcome obstacles and learn a little English!

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Both coaches meet their respective teams and offer advice to the fighters, all hopeful of winning the series and earning a UFC contract in the process

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: UFC President Dana White explains McGregor's approach to training while Team Faber gather to watch TJ Dillashaw's defence of his UFC Bantamweight Championship against Renan Barao

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Faber and McGregor exchange heated words about the Irishman's post-fight reactions, while a fighter elects to skip a training session prompting a frustrated outburst from his coach

programme.desc: Tensions rise in the house, with several fighters reflecting on their careers and the pressure of living among competition. Englishman Saul Rogers takes on Billy Quarantillo in the featured bout

programme.desc: McGregor, Faber and Cody Garbrandt get into a heated, then physical exchange when 'The Notorious' criticizes TJ Dillashaw and predicts an impending seperation from Team Alpha Male

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: A druken confrontation shocks the house. In an attempt to boost his team's spirit, Uriah Faber takes his fighters to a thrift store to buy outfits and mock McGregor's outlandish fancy threads. Martin Svensson fights Thanh Le in the featured bout

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: The coaches' challenge see McGregor and Faber compete in a target game throwing watermelons from a helicopter. The quarter-final match-ups are announced

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Artem Lobov calls out Julian Erosa, asking UFC President Dana White to make sure the two men face each other in the semi-finals of the competition

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: This title is a an action-comedy crime picture that brings together two seemingly disparate talents: Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg. Dwayne Johnson, Michael Keaton and Samuel L. Jackson also assume roles as part of this production’s star studded cast. Detectives Allen Gamble (Will Ferrell) and Terry Hoitz (Mark Wahlberg) are the laughing stock of the police department. Gamble’s fumbling nature and Hoitz’s tendency to fire off his gun when it is least appropriate have guaranteed the pair desk jobs as long as there is any excuse to keep them off the street. However, when the department’s two leading detectives lose their lives in an unglamorous, nay, silly accident Gamble and Hoitz are given a chance to step up. Will Hoitz’s gung-ho nature and Gamble’s nerd-like demeanor somehow provide the magic recipe for forensic success? Or will the two manage to screw things up once again – thereby earning another several decades in the police department filing room

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: As a way to prove himself worthy of marrying Angela, James' sister, security guard Ben joins his cop brother in law on a day long patrol of Atlanta

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film

programme.title: Knight & Day
programme.desc: This production is an action comedy starring Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz. The film was directed by James Mangold. Roy Miller (Tom Cruise) is an agent that has gone out of control. He bumps into June Havens (Cameron Diaz) at Wichita Airport and unwittingly helps her get a seat onboard her flight. Thus, Havens gets unintentionally embroiled in the complicated story of Miller the rogue secret agent, a story which would eventually take her on adventures half a world away. More than once Miller is forced to knock out Havens. However, in spite of that, she keeps following him around anyway

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: This title is a an action-comedy crime picture that brings together two seemingly disparate talents: Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg. Dwayne Johnson, Michael Keaton and Samuel L. Jackson also assume roles as part of this production’s star studded cast. Detectives Allen Gamble (Will Ferrell) and Terry Hoitz (Mark Wahlberg) are the laughing stock of the police department. Gamble’s fumbling nature and Hoitz’s tendency to fire off his gun when it is least appropriate have guaranteed the pair desk jobs as long as there is any excuse to keep them off the street. However, when the department’s two leading detectives lose their lives in an unglamorous, nay, silly accident Gamble and Hoitz are given a chance to step up. Will Hoitz’s gung-ho nature and Gamble’s nerd-like demeanor somehow provide the magic recipe for forensic success? Or will the two manage to screw things up once again – thereby earning another several decades in the police department filing room

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: This production is a romantic comedy that was directed by Anne Fletcher. The film stars Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds. Margaret Tate (Sandra Bullock) is the executive editor in chief of Ruick & Hunt Publishing. Her iron-fist management style has made her very unpopular among her employees who resent her bossy ways. To her horror, Margaret learns that she is being deported to Canada as her visa has expired. In order to avert a forced deportation, Margaret forces her assistance Andrew Paxton (Ryan Reynolds) to marry her. Although Andrew is a bit hesitant at first, he agrees after Margaret convinces him that if she is deported the new boss that would replace her will fire him straight away. The pair make their way to the Immigration Department where they meet immigration officer Mr. Gilbertson (Denis O’Hare). There they learn that a tip-off by one of Margaret’s former employees has led the department to suspect that their marital arrangements are fraudulent and are intended to avert Margaret’s deportation. They also learn that in order to verify the supposed marital process, the department will ask each of them questions separately in addition to interviewing their families. If they fail the interview process, Margaret will be deported and Andrew will be convicted of a felony with a $ 250,000 fine and a year in prison. Andrew has second thoughts about the arrangement after learning what it could cost him and thus he confronts Margaret and tells her he will continue the charade on the condition that she promotes him to editor and publishes his book. After seeing that he is adamant about his request, Margaret has no choice but to agree

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two best friends and CIA agents, Tuck a divorced guy and Frank, a ladies man. They discover falling in love with the same girl "Lauren". She is confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A loving father stays by his daughter's side after she gets infected with a recently out-broken disease that turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies

programme.desc: This film takes place in 1970s London; Terry Leather is a salesmen, happily married with children, and few secrets to keep. When an old friend, Martine Love, offers up a scheme to make some quick cash, Terry finds himself unable to refuse. With the help of a carefully selected crew including Kevin Swain and David Shilling, they rent a warehouse on Baker Street and begin tunneling to the nearby Loyd Bank. With their eye on the money stored in the bank’s safety deposit boxes, the crew finds themselves in for much more than they bargained

All Shirley wants is to gather her three adult children around her and share the news as a family. But Tammy, Kimberly and Byron are too distracted by their own problems: Tammy can't manage her unruly children or her broken marriage; Kimberly is gripped with anger and takes it out on her husband; and Byron, after spending two years in jail, is under pressure to deal drugs again. It's up to Madea, with the help of the equally rambunctious Aunt Bam, to gather the clan together and make things right the only way she knows how

However, his attempts to get to know her are blocked by Cheng, a “kung fu kid” who has a good time beating Dre to the ground. At this point Mr. Han (Jackie Chan) comes to Dre’s aid and begins teaching him the kung fu skills he will need to turn back his adversaries
